author: Rick Michaelson
comment: I've been a fan of a lot of DeNitE's watch faces and this one is my current favorite.

author: Doron Reinis
comment: Can't really check this one the basic version is too locked!!! It looks nice but all functions are locked

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: We're a small company that strives to create stylish products to make sure you look your best. This does take time and effort though, and rather than using popup ads as a revenue stream as most free apps use, we chose to provide some limited free capabilities to show you what we can do, along with a wider range of options for a small fee.
